rule.name: CASE_APP_generateNewsfeedPost
rule.definition: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types}CASE_APP_NewsfeedPost'( postType: "user", postIconDocId: null, postSourceName: null, postUserAuthor: "chris.watkins", postMessage: "Inventory for Brother products have gone low due to high customer demand. We will be receiving a new shipment at the start of next week.", postDelayInMinutes: 5, postAttachmentDocIds: null, postRecordTags: null, postComments: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "virginia.lane", Message: "When exactly will new stock become available for customer orders?", PostDelay: 5, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "chris.watkins", Message: "We expect our next shipment of Brother products on Tuesday next week", PostDelay: 8, isHazard: false ) }, postMoreInfo: {} ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types}CASE_APP_NewsfeedPost'( postType: "system", postIconDocId: #"_a-0000dc5c-bb1d-8000-edc1-01ef9001ef90_4311"[1], postSourceName: "BPM Reports", postUserAuthor: null, postMessage: "Customer order has been waiting in processing longer than 48 hours.", postDelayInMinutes: 20, postAttachmentDocIds: null, postRecordTags: null, postComments: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "john.rogers", Message: "What is the reason for this delay? We need orders to be processed under 2 days maximum!", PostDelay: 5, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "karen.anderson", Message: "Our supplier was delayed due to a weather event. This is the cause for the order processing delay.", PostDelay: 7, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "john.rogers", Message: "When will the supplier be back on schedule?", PostDelay: 10, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "karen.anderson", Message: "We expect the supplier to be in this afternoon for order fulfillment.", PostDelay: 13, isHazard: false ) }, postMoreInfo: {} ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types}CASE_APP_NewsfeedPost'( postType: "system", postIconDocId: #"_a-0000dc5c-bb1d-8000-edc1-01ef9001ef90_4311"[2], postSourceName: "SAP", postUserAuthor: null, postMessage: "Overdue payments total for June is $43,225.80", postDelayInMinutes: 25, postAttachmentDocIds: null, postRecordTags: null, postComments: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "joseph.clark", Message: "This is far too high. What is our sales team doing to contact these customers and get payments for invoices resolved?", PostDelay: 1, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "laura.davis", Message: "We are working with Finance on a calling campaign for all customers with outstanding invoices. We’ll provide updates here.", PostDelay: 3, isHazard: false ) }, postMoreInfo: {} ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types}CASE_APP_NewsfeedPost'( postType: "user", postIconDocId: null, postSourceName: null, postUserAuthor: "brian.chen", postMessage: "I have updated the document “A Guide to Energy Star Ratings.” Please review and offer any feedback. I will publish for sales training starting next week.", postDelayInMinutes: 40, postAttachmentDocIds: #"_a-0000dc5c-bb1d-8000-edc1-01ef9001ef90_4311"[3], postRecordTags: null, postComments: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "george.garcia", Message: "Thanks Brian for putting this together. This document will be really helpful to our field personnel.", PostDelay: 4, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "linda.jones", Message: "Will we have a sales training session on this next week, or do we just review this document?", PostDelay: 8, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "brian.chen", Message: "Yes. We will have a sales training session to go along with this training document.", PostDelay: 8, isHazard: false ) }, postMoreInfo: {} ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types}CASE_APP_NewsfeedPost'( postType: "user", postIconDocId: null, postSourceName: null, postUserAuthor: "laura.davis", postMessage: "All customer service reps are required to complete the training on our new product offerings. Please let me know if you have any questions.", postDelayInMinutes: 45, postAttachmentDocIds: null, postRecordTags: null, postComments: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "deborah.geary", Message: "How do we schedule our training sessions?", PostDelay: 4, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "laura.davis", Message: "You can schedule training from the process action on this system.", PostDelay: 8, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "brian.chen", Message: "Is there a deadline for when we must complete the training?", PostDelay: 10, isHazard: false ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_TempoComments'( User: "laura.davis", Message: "Yes. All training must be completed by the end of the month.", PostDelay: 13, isHazard: false ), }, postMoreInfo: {} ) }
